description: Standard mission types in Arka OS

mission_types.label: Discovery Mission
mission_types.description: Understanding context, stakes, actors, and landscape through structured exploration.

mission_types.label: Audit Mission
mission_types.description: Systematic evaluation of a system, process, or organization against defined criteria.

mission_types.label: Transformation Mission
mission_types.description: Design and orchestration of significant organizational or technical change.

mission_types.label: Implementation Mission
mission_types.description: Execution of a defined solution or change program with delivery milestones.

mission_types.label: Support Mission
mission_types.description: Ongoing assistance, monitoring, and optimization of existing systems or processes.
